name: wayback-machine
title: Wayback Machine
description: Quickly open and save webpages in Wayback Machine
author: pernielsentikaer

commands.name: open
commands.title: Open in Wayback Machine
commands.description: Open a webpage in Wayback Machine

commands.name: browser
commands.title: Open in Wayback Machine (Browser Extension)
commands.description: Open a webpage in Wayback Machine using the browser extension

commands.name: save
commands.title: Save to Wayback Machine
commands.description: Save a webpage to Wayback Machine

commands.name: saveMultiple
commands.title: Save Multiple to Wayback Machine
commands.description: Save multiple webpages to Wayback Machine
